flawed_nl_solution:
Will jogged for 60/2 = <<60/2=30>>30 minutes.
He was able to use up 10 x 30 = <<10*30=300>>300 calories for jogging.
The net calorie intake of Will after jogging is 900 - 300 = <<900-300=60>>60.
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 60. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
